Text saved: The Hunger Games is a big contest each year. It is on TV. Teenagers fight in it. The Capitol runs the Games to punish the areas. The areas fought back before. Tributes are teenagers that people choose to fight in the Games. Each year, they choose one boy and one girl. They are 12 to 18 years old. People pick them from each area by picking names from a box. The tributes must fight each other. Only one person can live. Everyone in the country must watch it on TV.
